concept.title: org.doctales.pdf-css
concept.shortdesc: The plugin org.doctales.pdf-css publishes DITA to HTML5 and then passes the output to node-html-pdf. This plugins takes a HTML file as a parameter and returns a PDF document.

conbody.note: The development has been stopped due to missing resources.
